```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(gt)
```

```{r}
harp_bens <- read.csv("/Users/rayhunter/Desktop/GP/gp_anadromites/data/benefits/ind_subbasin_rest_20s_2023-09-21 - ind_subbasin_rest_20s_2023-09-21.csv")
```

```{r}
harp_mod <- harp_bens %>% 
  filter(pop == "fall_chinook")

ben_by_scen <- harp_mod %>% 
  group_by(scenario) %>% 
    summarise(total_benefit = sum(n)) %>% 
  arrange(desc(total_benefit))


ben_by_scen %>% gt()
```
